page.title: 12The New Victoria Theatre
page.content: The site of the new theatre is a beautiful wooded garden at Stoneyfields,Basford,Newcastle on the Etruria Road,(A53). The theatre will still be in the round and will seat 600 in five rows, a set of boxes and a two row balcony. On the ground floor, there will be the entrance foyer,coffee bar,bookstall and cloakrooms for the public. The main storage areas,rehearsal rooms,costume, scenery and design will also have rooms on the ground floor.On the first floor there will be a self service restaurant,main bar and toilets.There will also be a library and reception rooms for meetings and education work and offices.The New Victoria Theatre will be opened in March 1986.Around the theatre there will be a nature conservation area.
